reviews.review: Look, if you don’t own this amazing piece of gaming history, then I have five words for you; Every game by Valve is
get it

Challenging game which never ends. Campaign is just the tip of the iceberg, and multiplayer is awesome. Solve mazes using your portal gun, lots of tricks and tons of imagination. Very good story line with humor quotes. Not the typical game, this is quite different.

Not as good as the first one, it seems easier and less focused on the puzzles (in single player). But the story is bigger and better and funnier, thus worth it alone. The co-op is where the real challenging puzzles are and they make up for the lack of teeth the single player has.

If you fell in love with Portal... You will worship Portal 2!!

Great Story, great gameplay, great entertainement. Never hesitate on buying this, it's a must have, along with Portal 1.

This game makes you want to play and keep playing, plus there's 2 player and a Community Test Chamber Initiative, giving you the chance to create and play custom maps!

BUY IT ALREADY!!
Nur zu empfehlen im CooP an der PS3...herrliches Spiel!

simplesmente genial!
tanto o portal como o portal 2 sao obras primas da industria dos videojogos que vao com certeza deixar a sua marca na historia.
recomendo vivamente

Um dos melhores jogos que ja joguei, tem uma historia incrivel, jogabilidade boa , uma quantidade gigantesca de secrets e easter eggs , tem uma boa trilha sonora, principalmente nos creditos , o jogo tem um bom single e um bom coop alem dos Mods feitos por fans e a ligação com a steam workshop pode expandir ainda mais suas horas de jogo, espero anciosamente uma sequencia. :)
Sehr gelungene Fortsetzung von Portal. Wem Teil 1 auch nur ein bisschen gefallen hat wird diesen Teil gerne spielen. Deeeeeutlich umfangreicher als das Original!
Put your brain to work with awesomeness
portals
Naprosto skvělá hra kterou si musíte zahrát!!!
Одна из лучших игр! Действительно очень увленкательная и интересная. Если любите игры с хорошим, тонким юмором и игры на смекалку, она для вас.
I am already thinking with Portals and you?
Ambientazioni fantastiche, storyline avvincente, gameplay alternativo e divertente. In poche parole: il miglior gioco di sempre!
Las patatas generan 1.1 V
Rien à dire,  Bon jeu !!
Лучшее продолжение лучшей игры. Да и вообще одна из лучших дилогий за последние два десятка лет.
Fun game.
The great thing about this game is that it has a mod where the in-game puzzle maker  can switch styles just by clicking a button

Kolejna część odsłony, zdecydowanie lepsza od poprzedniej. Jeszcze więcej zabawy, możliwości, portali oraz klocków!!! xD Zachęcam do zakupu!! :D
Polecam 10/10
Gra poprostu swietna nic dodac nic ujac
動頭腦解謎遊戲電腦不斷在你耳邊系系念....好玩又有趣!!  把握特價...
Very interesting game!!
Great Game
Fantastic

the charm of the game pulls you in with a story that, if you played the first game, will draw you in to the point where you won't want to stop playing. the real gimmick of the whole game, the portal gun, adds layers of depth to the game with puzzles that force you to think outside the box. a must have for all
SIM.
Lots of fun this game just buy and play it. there are so many ways to play this game. Fast, Slow, Bored, Happy even play the game if your angry. it keeps the fun spirit :)
throw portals and go [spoiler]to the moon[/spoiler]
Beat it in a day, nice.
명불허전 포탈
Assolutamente da provare
Sin duda se paga sólo, en combinación con Steam, juegazo...
Výborná hra. Je velmi dobře zpracovaná. Oproti 1. dílu méně náročná na PC. Velmi vtipná. Úžasně otestuje vaši logiku. Pro lidi jako já má i české titulky.
Einfach nur klasse! Spannend, abwechslungsreich, Denksport deluxe :)
Possibly the coolest game I've ever played.
Einfach mal Geniales Game!
Отличная игра, берите своего друга и наслаждайтесь великолепным коопом.
Portal 1 was great. Portal 2 surpasses the predecessor by a huge leap, both in terms of humour and puzzles. A definite recommendation, and me not being a fan of puzzle games is saying something.

I really enjoyed the first Portal game, so that I like this one is pretty obvious. But this one really go over the top compared to the first one since you can play coop with a friend (only one, sadly)! Playing together with someone makes things a LOT funnier, if you like your friend, that is ;) It's a great experience that have given me a lot of laughs and good times. the coop campain + bonus tracks take less than 6 hours even if you're a bit distracted and have to take a break here and there. considering that the whole first game took around 2-2,5 I see this as a great upgrade! it also support creation of your own map to a great extent which really open up posibilities for even more fun ;)
Sublime
Hammer
Every bit as good as the first Portal game... AND MORE!
Portal 2 is a masterpiece, a work of art that you will love for its ingenious story pop-culture, references to logical puzzles and co-op multiplayer. Definitely a candidate for game of the year
Amazing story. Challenging gameplay. Beautiful environments. Buy it.
Рекомендую использовать мастерскую
super fun
Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei. Puzzles muito divertidos e desafiadores e uma ótima história. Vale muito a pena comprá-lo.
So much awesome. Just buy it and have fun.
还没玩过多人模式…… 单人模式的开头充满了对失落的旧实验室的回忆……真是太刺激了…… 还有更多新的内容和新的挑战 ！ 木哈哈哈哈～～
nehéz :( de izgalmas (Y)

"Es sin duda unos de los mejores juegos que salieron hasta la fecha. Muy original, divertido, atrapante en todo sentido. Buenísima campaña singleplayer y campaña cooperativa, y si te cansas de ellas tenes la inmensidad de niveles que hacen los jugadores." 
9/10
Genial!!
YA
Get this game. The story will blow you away, literally. It's worth every dollar.
Синус на косинус минус тангенс гипотенузы в кубе делённые на разность вращательно-крутящих движений относительно вектора момента импульса в квадрате пополам
Fantastico!! Ottimo!! Emozionante!! Storia da urlo!!! Comicità!!! Colpi di scena!! Longevo!!! Impegnativo!!.... insomma, COMPRATELOOOOO!!!

Polecam tą gre każdemu który lubi chociaż trochę pogłówkować :) Jak na gre logiczną ma bardzo fajną oprawę audowizualną, świetnie napisane postacie mimo że spotkamy ich w grze tylko kilka i bardzo przyzwoitą i miejscami zaskakującą fabułę.  Jeszcze raz polecam każdemu kto chce chociaż trochę pomyśleć podczas rozgrywki :).

点个赞，别墅奥尔良。
创意太神了。。。。
Creative, smart and also funny!

Enjoyed Portal so much, I had to come back for 2nds. Certainly a "darker" game compared  to Portal...somewhat repetitive, but still entertaining.

One of my favorite games of the generation.
great game :)
I like this game~
Can't go wrong with an instant classic.

This game is the best game I have ever played. I enjoyed the story line, the sarcasim, Wheatly, and how GLaDOS acts around you when you carry her around as a potato while Wheatly is destroying the whole place. This game is described with a word that  is not even in the dictionary yet. This description of the game is true and the first sentence is not a exageration! I highly reccomend this game.
Really fun. And there's Co-op too.
Um dos melhores e mais emocionantes que já joguei....

Stupendo gioco che vi terrà ore incollate al monitor del PC, fantastico nella storia singler player, divertentissimo se giocato in coop con un amico

Nem tudom, mikor nevettem ennyit utoljára játékon. Hatalmas! És nehéz! Néha csak álltam egy teremben és gondolkodtam hosszú percekig! Akinek nincs még meg, az vegye meg mindenképp!
Enorme jeu, tout simplement. Immersif à souhait, et le mode coop est génial.
awesome spil men spil det først når du har klaret 1'eren ellers forstår du indtet!

so much fun
Guess this comes 2nd to L4D2 as in co-op game. Unique gameplay, interesting puzzles and mechanics. After finishing single player I had a blast playing co-op with a friend!
